SEARCH
Package entity

Class CampCommittee

Object
User
Student
CampCommittee
public class CampCommittee extends Student
The class represents a student who is part of the camp committee, inheriting basic student attributes. This class includes functionality to manage committee-specific information such as points, suggestions, and the camp committee they belong to
Since:
25/11/23
Version:
1.0
Author:
SCSZ Group 4
